page.title: 16LEEDS ROAD SHOPS
page.content: There is a load roar as the heavy traffic streams along the Leeds Road. The parade of shops were established in 1930 when the whole residential area was developed and has built up a great trade. The majority of their business comes from the local community but in the summer they benefit from passing trade on Leeds Road. There are many family businesses along the parade.Mickelthwaites the electricians shop is a popular, thriving business and repairs are done very cheaply.The best sales are from radios,batteries,and televisions.The owner is obliging and customers know that they are guaranteed fine after sales service.The paper shop has built up a splendid trade over the years and extended premises.It has a fine reputation for a wide selection of cards,chocolates and gifts.
